snippet: The campaign carries the theme “Content. Consumers. Collaboration. Amplified.” The message to advertisers is that there is more than just a network, NBC, but also a collection of cable channels and Web sites.
abstract: The campaign carries the theme “Content. Consumers. Collaboration. Amplified.” The message to advertisers is that there is more than just a network, NBC, but also a collection of cable channels and Web sites.

headline.main: NBCUniversal Ad Campaign Bolsters Its 'Upfront' Presentations
